metadata.title: CVE-2023-46407 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: FFmpeg prior to commit bf814 was discovered to contain an out of boundsread via the dist->alphabet_size variable in the read_vlc_prefix()function.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
